lv_427.logic.nazar_vladyka

Class LongestSubsequent

  • java.lang.Object
    • lv_427.logic.nazar_vladyka.LongestSubsequent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskExecutor

    public class LongestSubsequent
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaskExecutor
    Longest subsequence with difference one.

    The goal: To find how many numbers we have with difference one in the maximum sub sequence

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nazar Vladyka
